title: About us
body: The Soll Initiative Group is a collective of professionals dedicated to safeguarding cherished community traditions through modern solutions. Recognizing that technology can sometimes create distance, we created Soll as a secure, reliable, and efficient platform that strengthens the bonds of community. By revitalizing the long-practiced tradition of rotational savings, we aim to foster unity, build trust, and expand opportunities. If you would like to learn more or connect with us, we invite you to reach out using the contact form.

members.name: Handerson Coq
members.description: Handerson, a dedicated software engineer and entrepreneur, excels in developing community-oriented applications. He is passionate about creating digital solutions that enhance community engagement and drive societal progress.
